website_summaries.verdict: Three years in, the Nintendo 3DS handheld has become a seriously good game device -- especially for fans of Nintendo's classic gaming franchises -- and the XL is the one you should buy.
pros: The Nintendo 3DS XL has a two big screens, tons of great games, feels sturdy, and is the most kid-friendly gaming platform currently available
cons: Battery life is fair but still not great
the graphics are starting to look dated compared to other game platforms, and the 3D is largely an afterthought
downloaded game management still a huge headache

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo 3DS used HARDEN. It is super effective.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for my niece who is a Pokemon fanatic at the moment, but was a little skeptical of how much she would use it given that kids aren't known for placing a lot of value on keeping things in good shape. I was pleased to find out that I was very wrong. She loves it and uses it to store her DS and all her favorite games. If you or your kid love pokemon, you can't go wrong with this case. It seems to have pretty solid construction and isn't just cheap plastic either.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C.

customer_reviews.title: Tough for any occasion
customer_reviews.text: I use it still to this day, dropped it a few times, and my 3DS is still pristine. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: VaultScrolls

customer_reviews.title: BEST CASE!
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed case. The interior has a very soft and smooth feel to it and I feel 110% confident that my 3DS and games are secure and protected. Update 9/2/2017: Case is still going strong! The soft touch rubber/silicone interior has held up wonderfully for minor drops. The case has minimal scuffs and the picture is still gorgeous. I really can't express how happy I am to have purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: ✩ k

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like it. I think my grandson is going to like this case.
customer_reviews.author: Blan Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a gamer!
customer_reviews.text: Product as described, arrived promptly (prime) and the friend I gifted it to really liked the additional game compartments!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is hardcore! I'd never put my 3ds xl in anything else!
customer_reviews.author: thirstygiraffes

customer_reviews.title: This case is great! Was impressed with the quality and my son ...
customer_reviews.text: This case is great! Was impressed with the quality and my son is super happy with it! Win win!
customer_reviews.author: PBB&JJ

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this case in. Well it finally came and the button to open it will not push in and is just insanely hard to open. Sad to say i sent it back and am waiting on a refund so i can order o diffrent case that i hopefully wont have this problem with even tho this one had the design i liked the most. UPDATE: they sent me a new one instead of a refund. After using it for 6 months, it scratches really easy and the games fall out. Also if you wanna upgrade to the “new” 3ds xl, it fits but it also powers on every time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. It hold the games and the device very well and protect it.
customer_reviews.author: Bandar Alanazi

customer_reviews.title: Pokemon vault case is a go
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Looks nice and perfectly compliments my Pokemon collection!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase I've ever made on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Not only did the product arrive a week later than expected. It came in a torn, pre-opened box. The item was scuffed, the closure was faulty and broken. We had to return this just as soon as it arrived. Please look at other products for yourself or kids/recipients.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great case & look. I skipped one star cause it can be difficult to open.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

product_meta.title: Pokemon X & Y Game Vault Case (3DS XL / 3DS / DSi XL / DSi)
product_meta.description: Protect your Nintendo DS system and game cards with the Pokemon X and Pokemon Y Game Vault for Nintendo DS. Nothing protects your valuables like a vault. The officially licensed Pokemon X and Pokemon Y Game Vault for Nintendo DS encases your Nintendo DS system and game cards in a hard case with Pokemon X and Pokemon Y graphics. With space for your Nintendo DS system and up to six game cards, you'll be ready to game anywhere.
feature_bullets: Officially licensed case features Pokemon X and Pokemon Y graphics
